Reviews.Title: Absolutely nice!
Reviews.Author: Danny Z
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop before it was released so I wasn't really sure of what it would be, fortunately it is a nice and stylish laptop it has a great perfomance, really fast, so far it works great for my basic homework and university work (matlab, R, C++..etc), any complains about it. It's a pain in the .. to get used to windows 8 but once yo get used to it the whole thing it's pretty easy to enjoy. It was a good purchase in terms of price/specs because I don't needed an ultra fast jet/laptop. It "fits" perfectly for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Poor wireless performance. USB ports defective.
Reviews.Author: Itakethiscrayon
Reviews.Content: Bought the Fit 14E while it was on sale for ~$490.Pros:-Build quality is excellent.-Back-lit keyboard-Great display resolution-Decent Intel ULV processor-Acceptable battery life.Cons:-Known wireless issues with the Broadcom wireless card.  Frequent disconnects, link speed would drop to ~5Mbps. No resolution as of yet.-Back-lit keyboard can be annoying. The island style keys sit well above the LEDs below, allowing the light to shine directly at you. You can disable the back-light entirely, but you cannot change the brightness.-Viewing angles on display are not great.-Intel case badge was crooked : (I ended up replacing the stock WLAN card with an Intel Centrino 6235. This resolved the wireless issues. Unfortunately, the USB 2.0 ports on the right-hand side stopped working three weeks in. Returned.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: ashraf
Reviews.Content: it keeps disconnecting from the internet and why do u have a touch screen video about  a laptop that is not touch screen??? !!!!!

Reviews.Title: Issues with this laptop!
Reviews.Author: AP "AP"
Reviews.Content: I was very exited to unbox this laptop but soon discovered that it is very slow, touchpad mouse has mind of its own...while trying to scroll up or down it sticks and freezes, occasionally it will just not work. I had high hopes for this brand but am very disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Decent at best.
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Labrousse
Reviews.Content: The wireless connection is terrible and constantly dropping.  The mouse pad sticks or freezes and the computer has to be reset for it to stop.  If you accidentally brush the mouse pad with your hand while typing it zooms the screen in and out.  For the price I expected a better product.

Reviews.Title: Great computer
Reviews.Author: Heloísa
Reviews.Content: Great computer! Love the lights in the keyboard, although it is a little difficult to get used to the windows 8.

Reviews.Title: student
Reviews.Author: Danielle James
Reviews.Content: this product is good, the only problem I have is trying install softwear, for my printer to connect but other then that it cool, the speaker is nice you could hear clear sound,and the apps that window8 provide is pretty cool. and it is fast.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was looking for.
Reviews.Author: Lola LaFosse
Reviews.Content: My last laptop was a VAIO that lasted me a long seven years, so this brand was my go-to when it was time to upgrade. I didn't realize it had a i3 (instead of i5) processor until I ordered (because.. apparently I can't read, so) but it hasn't seemed to make THAT much of a difference in functionality. Main pro, for me at least, with this upgrade, is the battery life. With the right settings, this thing goes for HOURS.

Reviews.Title: Broke down in 2 months
Reviews.Author: charles
Reviews.Content: Bought for school and for my small business that was sustaining me through college. The laptop screen died on me, the wireless connection was also not stable (disconnects on it own). Returned it for repair and It is taking forever. This PC is beautiful but it falls short on everything else. Will never buy a sony vaio again.

Reviews.Title: Great choice
Reviews.Author: Ayanna Lewis
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my bro, he loves it! He'll recommend it to anyone. Only thing is, he wish he had bought the touch screen

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: Nathalie
Reviews.Content: This is the second laptop we have purchased and we love it. Great quality. Works good. I don't think I would switch to another brand.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Juan Calderon
Reviews.Content: Thank you very much! It arrived in on time. I guess my wife it's gonna be really happy when she get it. Keyboard backlight is a great detail

Reviews.Title: Warning!! There is a slow WIFI issue with the VAIO Fit!!
Reviews.Author: Mario Fernandez Ulloa
Reviews.Content: The velocity of the WiFi is an issue. My five years Toshiba Satellite works better. It seems that above 100 ft. the signal is lost. I read similar complaints and chat support doesn't help. You can read complaints in this site: [...]

Reviews.Title: Falsely Advertised
Reviews.Author: PW
Reviews.Content: Purchased this laptop for my daughter's 16th birthday.  It is advertised as a touchscreen laptop in the video accompanying the pics but it is not a touchscreen.  I called Amazon Customer Service to ask if they sent the wrong computer but never got a straight answer.  After speaking with two different supervisors over a period of two hours and promises of rectifying the problem I was finally advised this laptop should not have been listed as a touchscreen in the video.  Their solution was to put another computer in my shopping cart to review which cost another 150.00 dollars over what I had already spent.  I felt they should have comped me a touchscreen computer for the same price since it was their error but of course they didn't see it that way.  They also stated it was being removed from their site since it wasn't advertised correctly.  I see that after two days it's still there.  This is false advertisement in my opinion and it smells of switch and bait.

Reviews.Title: USER MANUAL
Reviews.Author: Brandes Enrique "ENRIQUE BRANDES"
Reviews.Content: DO YOU SELL  SVF14212CXB USER MANUAL?OTHERWISE WHERE CAN I DOWNLOAD IT?THANKSENRIQUEPS I BOUGHT THIS ITEM BUT I DIDN'T RECEIVE YET, THEN I WANT STUDY NOW
